verses.verse: (A Song; a Psalm of the sons of Korah.) Great <S%H1419><s%> is the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised, <S%H1984><s%> In the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> His holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

Beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in elevation, <S%H5131><s%> the joy <S%H4885><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth, <S%H776><s%> Is Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> [in] the far <S%H3411><s%> north, <S%H6828><s%> The city <S%H7151><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> King. <S%H4428><s%>
God, <S%H430><s%> in her palaces, <S%H759><s%> Has made Himself known <S%H3045><s%> as a stronghold. <S%H4869><s%>
For, lo, <S%H2009><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> assembled <S%H3259><s%> themselves, They passed <S%H5674><s%> by together. <S%H9191><s%>
They saw <S%H7200><s%> [it], then <S%H3651><s%> they were amazed; <S%H8539><s%> They were terrified, <S%H926><s%> they fled <S%H2648><s%> in alarm. <S%H2648><s%>
Panic <S%H9564><s%> seized <S%H270><s%> them there, <S%H8033><s%> Anguish, <S%H2427><s%> as of a woman in childbirth. <S%H3205><s%>
With the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> Thou dost break <S%H7665><s%> the ships <S%H591><s%> of Tarshish. <S%H8659><s%>

As we have heard, <S%H8085><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> have we seen <S%H7200><s%> In the city <S%H5892><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God; <S%H430><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will establish <S%H3559><s%> her forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
We have thought <S%H1819><s%> on Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> In the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Thy temple. <S%H1964><s%>

As is Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> is Thy praise <S%H8416><s%> to the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>
Let Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> be glad, <S%H8055><s%> Let the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> Because <S%H4616><s%> of Thy judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
Walk <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and go <S%H5362><s%> around <S%H5362><s%> her; Count <S%H5608><s%> her towers; <S%H4026><s%>

Consider <S%H7896><s%> <S%H3820><s%> her ramparts; <S%H2426><s%> Go <S%H6448><s%> through <S%H6448><s%> her palaces; <S%H759><s%> That you may tell <S%H5608><s%> [it] to the next <S%H314><s%> generation. <S%H1755><s%>
For such <S%H2088><s%> is God, <S%H430><s%> Our God <S%H430><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever; <S%H5703><s%> He will guide <S%H5090><s%> us until <S%H5921><s%> death. <S%H4192><s%>
